summary: Improves the Ancient Falmer armor, Auriel\'s shield, Auriel\'s Bow and the Bloodcursed/Sunhallowed Elven arrows
descriptionHtml:
When I first got Dawnguard I was looking forward to getting the Ancient Falmer armor. When I found out they weren\'t as good as I was hoping I was pretty disappointed.

This mod improves the Ancient Falmer armor by making it as strong as ebony armor. It also adds an Ancient Falmer crown to Auriel\'s Temple Balcony. I also makes everything slightly (2-3 points) more heavy, just to keep it balanced. It also improves Auriel\' bow and shield. There is an optional file to improve Sunhallowed and Bloodcursed arrows to. And there is a file to give all things Daedric stats. It also renames all armor to Ancient Ivory.

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD

Ancient Ivory Cuirass
Armor - 43
Weight - 10

Ancient Ivory Gauntlets
Armor - 16
Weight - 4

Ancient Ivory Boots
Armor - 16
Weight - 4

Ancient Ivory Crown
Armor - 0
Weight - 2

Sunhallowed Arrows
Damage - 18

Bloodcursed Arrows
Damage - 18

Auriel\'s Bow
Damage - 17

Auriel\'s Shield
Damage - 34 (slightly more than Ebony)

If you are having any problems (there shouldn\'t really be any) please note it in the comments

DO NOT REUPLOAD ANYWHERE

Recommended Mods
Ancient Falmer Armor HD retext and redone by Barneq - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34395//? 
if you want your Ancient Falmer to look even more epic

Auriels Bow Gold and Argent Retexture by Den987 -
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30663//?
A really good Auriel\'s bow retex

Ancient Falmer Sword by wulfos -
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34126//?
If you want a sword to go with the armor

Ancient Falmer Helmet by DerekM17x -
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23131//?
Adds a helmet to go with the set

Ancient Falmer Bow by droot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23815//?
For a really epic Ancient Falmer bow

If you have any suggestions for another \"True\" mod please message me or say it in the comments

Thanks,
Ethernal Hero
author: ethernalhero
